name: Cisco | IOS | Network | NTP | System Clock Adjusted (SYSLOG)
description: Oct 31 07:16:16.448 MSK: %SYS-6-CLOCKUPDATE: System clock has been updated from 07:16:14 MSK Mon Oct 31 2011 to 07:16:16 MSK Mon Oct 31 2011, configured from NTP by 192.168.100.253

patterns.value_re: %SYS-6-CLOCKUPDATE: System clock has been updated from .+ to .+, configured from NTP by (?P<server_address>\S+).$
